name: Nothing to Lose (nagaty)
description:
(En raison d'un bug sur github, je vous mets le lien de la page itchio où le jeu est jouable)

Tadakatsu Honda progresses through a combat zone full of pitfalls, dodging crevices and projectiles. On this battlefield, there are turrets. The turrets are not going to let it pass like that. He’ll have to face them if he wants to defeat their leader in order to disable all these turrets.
